React lifecycle methods diagram: React komponentining hayot sikli metodlari diagrammasi
Show less-common lifecycles: Kam qo‘llaniladigan hayot sikli metodlarni ko‘rsatish
Pure and has no side effects. May be pau: Pure va hech qanday nojo‘ya ta’siri yo‘q. React tomonidan bloklanishi, tugatilishi va qayta ishga tushirilishi mumkin.
Can work with DOM, run side effects, sch: DOM bilan ishlay oladi, yon ta’sirlarni (side effects) bajaradi, yangilanishlarni belgilaydi.
See project's page on GitHub (opens in a: Loyihaning GitHub sahifasiga o'tish (yangi sahifada ochiladi)
